dev-1.x.name: drupal/creativity

security-coverage.message: Project has not opted into security advisory coverage!

dev-1.x.description: Creativity is a free responsive and fully customizable Drupal 8 theme whose Base theme is bootstrap. It is a generic theme and is best suited for businesses ,portfolio &  magazine sites. Moreover, it can be used as a base theme to give your own theme a very specific business profile look.
